mcq.statement: Who wrote 'Loyal Muhammadans of India' to improve the image of Muslims in front of the rulers?
mcq.one_liner: The book 'Loyal Muhammadans of India' was written to promote goodwill for Muslims among the rulers by **Sir Syed Ahmed Khan**.
